character.age: 28 years old with a rugged complexion from years of adventuring.
character.background: Eryndor was born in the kingdom of Eldrador to a family of noble lineage. He was trained by his father, a renowned warrior, in the art of combat and swordsmanship. However, after his parents' tragic death in battle, Eryndor set out on his own to make a name for himself in the world.
